comment: I'm a one platform kind of Buddhist. I used to love but they turned into shadowbanning below board weasels so now I'm here and is going to be the new pulse of the planet. Back in the day if you didn't like something you changed the channel. People bug you, mute them. they really piss you off block them it's so simple.
